description.@en: Whether you need to know of matters cartographical or the movement of the heavenly spheres, I am here.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Astronomy. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Astronomy, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
